task: Add a column to a table
steps: Navigate to the page where the table is located.
Click inside the table to select it.
In the Table Tools tab, click on the Layout tab.
In the Table group, click on the Formula button.
In the Formula dialog box, enter the name of the new column in the 'Column name' field.
Specify the data type and other properties for the new column as needed.
Click on the OK button to add the column to the table.
